const response = await client.search({
  body: {
    query: {
      term: {
        product: 'chocolate'
      }
    },
    sort: [
      {
        'offer.price': {
          mode: 'avg',
          order: 'asc',
          nested: {
            path: 'offer',
            filter: {
              term: {
                'offer.color': 'blue'
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    ]
  }
})
console.log(response)
